Both "I Heart Huckabees" and "What Women Want" might be enjoyable for you!

"I Heart Huckabees" is a unique comedy where a team of existential detectives helps people solve their deepest life questions, featuring an all-star cast including Dustin Hoffman and Lily Tomlin.

On the other hand, "What Women Want" stars Mel Gibson as an advertising executive who magically gains the ability to hear women's thoughts, offering a humorous exploration of gender dynamics with actors like Helen Hunt and Bette Midler. I hope one (or both) of these recommendations spark your interest!
